top_categories.workout_context: Silver City Century's Iowa rolling gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
At mile 60 of 100, glycogen is gone. This workout teaches your body to produce watts on fumes.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Silver City Century. Train it until it feels boring.
At Silver City Century, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
Silver City Century's Iowa rolling, Local event forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 100 miles.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 100 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
100 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Silver City Century's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before May.
Two threshold sessions per week without the recovery cost of VO2max work. For 100 miles, sustainable FTP gains matter more than peak power.
Tempo is Silver City Century's race pace. The wattage you'll hold for 100 miles on Iowa rolling gravel. Train it until it's automatic.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 3,000ft of climbing on Iowa rolling gravel does to your power file on race day.
Varied gradients on Iowa rolling gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Silver City Century’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Silver City Century requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on iowa rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: iowa rolling, local event, midwest gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Durability, and G Spot to prepare you for 100 miles of iowa rolling gravel in Silver City, Iowa.
